title: Sample, ca. 1953
medium:
Medium: synthetic fiber, cotton?
Technique: twill weave
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 19.1 x 24.1 cm (7 1/2 x 9 1/2 in.)
creditline: Gift of the Estate of Dorothy (Liebes) Morin
description:
1/3 twill with a variety of wefts, predominantly deep purple. 
Warp: 1 brown 3 ply yarn, 3 beige 2 ply yarn. 
Weft: bands of various yarns making 4 3/4" repeat. Yarns include chenilles, smooth yarns and plied yarns in varying weights all in purple or maroon.
